Package org.consensusj.bitcoin.zeromq

Class RxBitcoinSinglePortZmqService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.consensusj.bitcoin.zeromq.RxBitcoinSinglePortZmqService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, RxBlockchainBinaryService
    public class RxBitcoinSinglePortZmqService
extends java.lang.Object
implements RxBlockchainBinaryService, java.io.Closeable
    Bitcoin Zmq binary service that connects to a single port. Use RxBitcoinZmqBinaryService if Bitcoin Core is configured to run ZMQ on multiple ports. See: PR 19752 for sequence topic information
